spec_data.Name: php-pear-Console-CommandLine
spec_data.Description:
Console_CommandLine is a full featured package for managing command-line
options and arguments highly inspired from python optparse module, it allows
the developer to easily build complex command line interfaces.

Main features:
* handles sub commands (i.e. $ my-script.php -q sub-command -f file),
* can be completely built from an XML definition file,
* generate --help and --version options automatically,
* can be completely customized,
* built-in support for i18n,
* and much more...
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 05 Oct 2017 11:17:45 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A full featured command line options and arguments parser
